[b]"PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR"[/b]
バグ、煽り、VCPT、回線ぶっこ抜き、エアプ調整にあふれた素敵なゲームです。

[h1][バグ][/h1]
バグの修正はバグの追加とほぼ同義。
バグを潰せばバグが湧く。もぐらたたきだ！
[b][20190619追記][/b]
きょうのアプデ後1戦目で早速バグをみつけたぞ。
[b]バベチリトークンが見た目3つまでしか溜まらない！[/b](内部的には4つ溜まってるっぽい？)
こんなんキラーで真面目にテストプレイしてれば一瞬で見つかると思うんですけど。
[b][20190619追記2][/b]
スプリントバースト温存グリッチに遭遇。
マジでヤバイ級のバグだと思うんで即刻修正してくださいおねがいします。
[b][20190621追記][/b]
鯖のなんかのパークが全行動速度上昇になっている。
鬼のなんかのパークが全行動速度減少になっている。
スプバのグリッチがアカチャンに見えるくらいヤバイバグだ。
ほんとおねがいします……どんなに遅くてもイベント期間中に修正してください……。
修正できないなら使用不可にくらいできるよね？　イベ期間終わったオファリング使用不可にできるもんね？

[h1][煽り][/h1]
屈伸、ライト、窓越え、ロッカー。
カチカチカチカチバンバンカチカチカチバンカチカチカチカチ
うるせ～～～～～！！！！！！
知らね～～～～～～～～！！！！！！！
=lﾆﾆﾌ
Dead by Dayl
ight
[b]まあ、勝ってればほぼ煽られないんですけどね。[/b]

[h1][VCPT][/h1]
意思の疎通がままならない中で脱出を目指すのが醍醐味ではないのか！？
仕様上VCPTを排除しにくいのは知ってる。

[h1][回線切り][/h1]
1マッチ1切断はノルマかってレベルで遭遇する(20190602時点)。
トンネルされたら切断とかオメーそのDSと英雄の奮起は飾りか？
開幕見つかったら切断とかゲームの趣旨わかってる？
ペナルティつけてください。
何回か以上切ったら2週間BANとかおねがいします。
おねがいします。

[h1][エアプ調整][/h1]
サバイバーとキラーをランク1にしてから運営・開発してくれます？

[h1][これからこのゲームを始めるひとへ][/h1]
とりあえずうまいひとの動画みて勉強しよう。

　[b][キラー][/b]
　アイテム持ち込みが多かったら解散しよう。
　工具箱はマジでヤバい。
　ライト・地図はPT率高い気がする。
　救急箱は一人までならまあ許してもいいんじゃないすか。
　なんにせよ一部のリアルチート以外はキラーするなら覚悟しておけ。
　ナースとヒルビリーが基礎能力高くておすすめだぞ。勝ちたいならこいつらの練習しよう。

　[b][サバイバー][/b]
　運営ちゃんはサバイバーに有利な調整してくれるぞ。
　たのしもう。

This game is very good. With some bugs but still amazing game and concept.It may take awhile to get used to the game and how to play it, the community can be really toxic but their nice too. This game has dlc. Which is pretty good for my opioin. overall this game is good. 10/10

This game has been going in a downhill direction since 2020 and I'm if nothing just so glad I quit playing. 
The devs just release half baked nearly identical dlc every couple months for a stupid price, whilst empowering and embracing their toxic fanbase. 

I cannot make this clear enough. There are 26 killers, if you reach any high rank you'll only see 3 of them for the rest of you playtime, and there is no "casual" mode to just try to have fun. That or you'll queue with hackers, there is no karma system, there are no hwid bans, hackers can make it so killers or fellow survivors cannot leave games by winning/losing, meaning you need to leave the game by the menu and get a temporary ban.
This is because for every game there are 4 survivors and 1 killer, and the devs have made it evidently clear they care more about making money from the majority of their players, than making sure everyone has a good time. 

This game was fun in 2018-2020, it is not anymore. It is a frustrating mess, and the fact it is still tagged as a horror game is confusing to me.

KEDŽE VŠAK TEAM HOROR HIER JE NEDOSTATOK tak je to asi jediná taka volba čo si zahrať s tým že najdete aj ludí čo by to hralo ...

At the moment of writing this review, this game is my most played on steam, and for good reason.

Let me just say, this game isn't very scary after your first few matches, but that doesn't mean it gets any less fun. I've been with this game since after it came out of beta, and it has been a bumpy ride. While there have been problems here and there because of balancing issues, the game has slowly but surely balanced out to a point where both sides feel like they have a good chance of winning. Comparing the amount of killers and survivors to release, it's easy to tell the devs have poured their heart and soul into this game, and that they wont be stopping any time soon.

To sum it up, if you have some friends, and like scary concepts, this game should either be in your library, or on your wishlist.

Fantastic game that I can’t get enough of, takes a while to get anywhere, I made the mistake of upgrading different survivors when I should have read the discussions and found out how the best beginner survivors are.  Trying to survive and survive well so you can upgrade your character is so addictive, tried killer a few times but was hopeless so I’m avoiding that for now especially with the survivors making sure you know how bad you are in chat at the end of each map, some understand and are friendly others are horrible to you.  The game is great for multiplayer as you can have 3 friends play with you which makes it even more fun.

My only issues are getting disconnected which may be partly an issue at my end but does seem to be a game issue.  When you first start and maybe always it’s mabye best to ignore the chat, there are some idiots out there that will let you know if you don’t meet there standard.

Buying dlc isn’t a must, it gives you more killers and survivors but there not really any better than the ones that come with the base game

I think the game is great but the community can toxic especially to beginners. I still recommend it.

Bem, uma análise bem profunda do jogo, se você gosta de jogos de terror, esse não seria exatamente a minha definição de terror, apesar de tudo é um ótimo jogo para gastar horas e dar boas risadas com os amigos, passar raiva também pois o jogo está repleto de bugs que vez ou outra afetam sua jogabilidade e alguns bugs muito simples que estão presentes desde sempre no jogo, a cada atualização a vontade de jogar aumenta apesar de saber que com a "att" irá vir novos bugs e anyway.


Recomendado por mim, se você não se apegar pelo jogo nas suas primeiras 20 horas de jogatina esqueça que o jogo não é para você :z

also mal ehrlich an alle mimimis da draußen ....das hier ist ein spiel bei dem ein übermächtiger "Killer" ein paar "Opfer" jagt...warum zur hölle regt sich hier irgendjemand auf das der Killer OP sei? da kann ich mir echt nur vor den kopf schlagen....genauso sachen wie campen und tunnel und blablabla....wenn mir nunmal der dude der am haken hing direkt wieder in die arme läuft soll ich ihn dann laufen lassen weil es "fair" ist? meint ihr jason freddie oder irgendwer der anderen killer lässt euch laufen? denkt mal n meter weiter als eure komfort zone in der alles nach eurer nase tanzen muss....und es ist übrigens auch eine unart den killer zu teabaggen bloß weil man 3 stunden im kreis rennen kann und somit relativ sicher vor dem killer ist....wenn ihr fairness wollt verhaltet euch fair....ich als killer spiele fair und hänge leute auf und dann haue ich von dem haken ab....wenn aber kiddies meinen mich teabaggen zu müssen ja dann bin ich halt der meinung das ich campen muss...es ist ein geben und nehmen....spielt fair und mit euch wird fair gespielt so einfach ist das!!!

Po 30 godz rozgrywki juz sie troche zorientowalam i moge powiedziec, ze polecam. Gra zapewnia dobra rozrywke, nawet jesli ktos dopiero zaczyna. Trzyma w napieciu i dostarcza sporo wrazen. Nie jest bez wad- brak dedykowanych serwerow czesto skutkuje lagami ktore znaczaco utrudniaja rozgrywke. Uwazam tez, ze balans niektorych elementow rozgrywki moglby byc lepszy a niektore mechaniki wystepujace w grze- frustrujace, zwlaszcza dla Survivorow. Mimo tego jesli nie podchodzi sie do gry na 100% tryhard to mozna sie bardzo dobrze bawic. Ogolnie polecam, chetnie bede dalej grala.
Играя за маньяка ты боишься выживших...

Ах да, хитбоксы топчик, удары в окна тоже, лаги тоже. Найс игра

Dead By Daylight is an amazingly immersive horror, where even now after 80 hours in, still makes me jump. The developers update it regularly, there are regular DLCs and gameplay changes so no two matches are exactly the same and I highly recommend playing it.
However...
[strike] The bug where there is a never-ending loading screen while trying to load a lobby causes me to restart the game maybe four or five times a day which is more than irritating and I'm slowly looking for a better game that doesn't do this. This bug has existed for months if not the entire time the game has been released with no word from the devs of whether it would be fixed or not. The bug makes it impossible to join a lobby without completely shutting down the game each time it happens [/strike]
Update: They seem to have fixed this bug and I can say after the long time since I've made this review, the game has only improved since. Have fun!

时长居然是个人第二。。。
当初B站团子带入坑的，果然买了发现和主播玩儿的不是一个游戏。从曾经的无敌房版本，到现在也只会玩儿黑蘑菇，能勉强上到15段
这游戏15段以下都是完全不会的小白，QTE都不一定打得到的那种，就是曾经的我。
希望能渐渐会溜板溜无敌房，至少拖个1分钟不要做秒倒怪；希望渐渐能连起来护士，因为走地屠夫好像真的更难。。。

Pontos positivos

-Muito divertido 

-Nunca vi nenhum jogo com estilo de gameplay parecida,acaba sendo bem inovador

Pontos negativos

-Bugs

-Demora pra achar partida

-Quando se aprende a jogar vc percebe o desbalanceamento entre killers e assasinos

Co víc říct o tom jak je hra nevybalancovaná a jak killeři nedostávají postihy za to když tunnelují nebo kempí vám snad řikat nemusím. Hru NEDOPORUČUJU i přes srandu co jsem zažil protože vývojáři maj zaražený hlavy v prdelích a neumí opravit CHYBY, které po nich lidé chtějí už léta.  Místo uptadu v podobě BUG FIXED dostanete jen další zkurvenou kosmetickou sračku nebo dalšího killera, který bude opět rozbitý a nevybalancovaný. Za mě radši těch několik eur bych dal do pořádné příběhové hry, která má potenciál nebo do hry o kterou se vývojáři  starají. Rank systém, který vás maximálně vtáhne do špatné nálady, protože vám to hodí hráče o 10 ranků dolu či nahoru. Pokud by ste v této hře vynikali tak se nebojte tady vás za to potrestají neschopní debilové co vás jen pokempí na háku.
Zasranej rank system uplně k hovnu dává to ranky k vám co tam absolutně nemají co dělat.
Vypíčená Huntresska doufám že tuhle zpívající kundu odendají ze hry bylo by jen dobře.
Nové mapy jsou dělány jen na vzhled, nejsou balancované ani přehledné. Místo open mapy dostanete policejni stanici na které, jsou geny nejdal co to jen jde na místech kde by je nikdo nehledal. 2/10
Игра ну реально для даунов, но интересная. BHVR испортили игру

Ah, Dead by Daylight. What is there to say about you? 

Pros 
Every game is different, as long as you're not R1 
Creative killers, with different powers that assist in the murdering of survivors 
Lore that takes hours of getting into before anything makes sense

Cons 
HITBOXES. Seriously. 
Buggy games
Somewhat Toxic Community. 

Personally, This all balences out for my own gaming experience.  Fun game, will continue playing and enjoying for the most part.

Game is riddled with cheaters which make the game unfair and frustrating, as if its not already frustrating enough with broken implementations of MMR and Hit Validation. Developers and Moderators of this game protects cheaters and don't want them to be revealed which is a big BS in my opinion. They're a bunch of snowflakes, keep doing this and your game will be full of 'em and will die off. 

Also, removing features after releasing DLCs which they obviously rushed just to earn money, and also the NFT situation which concerned players were mad about. What a crapshow of a game and devs.
